Logout Welcome to the location reminder app Login Map Normal Map Hybrid Map Satellite Map Terrain Map Lat: %1$.5f, Long: %2$.5f Dropped Pin poi Location services must be enabled to use the app You need to grant location permission in order to select the location. Settings Please select a point of interest Geofence Entered GeofenceStatus Geofence status notification Location Reminder Please select title Please select location Geofence added Problem while adding geofence. Welcome Please enter title Please enter α description Please select location Login unsuccessful There are no reminders
Unknown error: the Geofence service is not available now. Geofence service is not available now. Go to Settings>Location>Mode and choose High accuracy. Your app has registered too many geofences. You have provided too many PendingIntents to the addGeofences() call. Cannot add geofence! Insufficient location permissions Geofence requests are too frequent Error Happened, Can\'t Add Geofence Test exception
Hello blank fragment Sign in with Google Map Sign in with email
Access to the fine location service is required to acquire \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. Your location on the map will not be available while the location service is disabled! This app requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Location Reminders\'. Geofence permission is required. Cannot create a GeoFence while fine location permission is denied! Location service is disabled. For better experience, turn on device location, which uses Google\'s location service. The app cannot display your location on the map while the location service is disabled! Geofence not saved because location services are disabled! Open location settings Cancel Access to the background location service is required to use \'Geofences\' feature, which notifies you when you are near a saved POI. This app requires "access background location" permission to enable the \'Geofences\' feature. Please try again and grant access to use the background location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Location Reminders\'. This app requires "access fine location permission to enable the \'Geofences\' feature. Please try again and grant access to use the fine location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Location Reminders\'.Ω This app require the access fine location permission in order to create geofences. Background location permission is required for this application. Geofence removed! Error while removing geofence\n New reminder
Are you sure you want to Delete this location reminder?
EXTRA_REMINDER Location Longitude Description Latitude Yes No Are you sure you want to delete this reminder?
